name: Zombidle : REMONSTERED
description: Like the song says, good guys finish last, and in this case, they also finish homeless and on fire. Welcome to Zombidle, Berzerk Studio's newest idle game, or tap game; whatever, you do you, man.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Something that goes beep beep boop Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Any decent graphics card that has been released after the movie "BraveHeart" DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Pretty sure even with just the PC Speakers you're ok.
